content: The Willow Wood Staff is the basic weapon you get at the beginning of Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with standard stats, little damage, and overall isn't much use beyond the initial opening moments of the game. Before long you will want to switch to one of the other Weapons.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Willow_Wood_Staff.md', within the main section titled 'Willow Wood Staff'.
The content is as follows:
The Willow Wood Staff is the basic weapon you get at the beginning of Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with standard stats, little damage, and overall isn't much use beyond the initial opening moments of the game. Before long you will want to switch to one of the other Weapons.
